name: Heart to Heart
description: Intimate questions for couples or close friends

prompts.text: What's something about me that you find attractive that I might not expect?
When did you first realize you had feelings for me?
What's your favorite memory of us together?
What do you think makes our connection special?
What's something you want to experience with me?
What's something I do that makes you feel loved?
What's your love language?
What's a fantasy you've never shared with anyone?
What do you think is our biggest strength as a pair?
What's something you've always wanted to ask me but haven't?
What's something I could do to make you feel more appreciated?
Where do you see us in five years?
What's a secret you'd only tell me?
What do you find most challenging about being with me?
What's the most romantic thing someone has ever done for you?
What does your ideal day together look like?
What's something you admire about me?
What do you need from me that you're not getting?
What's a moment when you felt closest to me?
What's something you want us to try together?
What physical touch means the most to you?
What's a topic we should talk about more?
What's something I've said that you'll never forget?
How can I better support you during hard times?
What's the most intimate moment we've shared?
What do you wish I knew about you?
What makes you feel closest to me?
What's a boundary you need me to respect?
What's your biggest hope for our relationship?
What's something you're grateful for about me?
What do you think our biggest challenge will be?
When do you feel most vulnerable with me?
What's something you want to improve in our relationship?
What does commitment mean to you?
What's your biggest fear about us?
What do you want me to know that's hard to say?
What's a dream you want us to chase together?
What makes you feel safe with me?
What's something I do that turns you on?
What do you think drew us together?
What's a promise you want to make to me?
What's the most important thing in a relationship to you?
What do you love most about our relationship?
What's something you want to apologize for?
What do you need to feel fully seen by me?
What's something you've always wanted to say to me?
What do you think I need to hear right now?
What's the best thing about being with me?
What do you want our relationship to teach you?
If we could start over, what would you do differently?
